content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) and another burner inserter at position (x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Transport belt system
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) and another transport belt at position (x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them
### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power network before attempting to use it
### Errors when using offshore pump
- Ensure that the offshore pump is connected to a pipe network before attempting to use it
### Errors when using inserter
- Ensure that the inserter has source items before attempting to use it
### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has ingredients before attempting to use it

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions defined by the agent.
No important variables assigned by the agent.
